title: Execution Policy Schema
description: Deterministic policy for bundle execution and verification requirements

require_receipt_attestation.description: Require every receipt to have valid attestation

require_merkle_attestation.description: Require valid Merkle attestation for the receipt chain

strict_trust.description: Enforce strict trust policy checking (requires trust_policy_path)

trust_policy_path.description: Path to trust policy JSON file, or null to skip trust checks
